articles.author: Lauren Garafano
articles.title: 17 Famous Artists Injured During Their Concerts - BuzzFeed
articles.description: During a show, Patti Smith was dancing so hard that she fell off the stage into the concrete 14 feet below her. She fractured her skull, injured several vertebrae, broke some teeth, and lost some of her eyesight.
